docs.title: UMA mkdocs template
docs.text:
*the University of Málaga mkdocs template. *

By Juan M. Gandarias

Systems Engineering and Automation Department

Find out more...

docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
This is the home of the UMA mkdocs template developed by Dr Juan M. Gandarias, an Assistant Professor in the Systems Engineering and Automation Department at the University of Málaga.

Please, use this template if you want to elabotare more mkdocs website material for the University of Málaga.

docs.title: Acknowledgements
docs.text: The delivery of these materials following this format has been inspired by the work done by Dr. Tom Howard in the COM2009-3009 Robotics Course at The University of Sheffield.

docs.title: Iteration 1
docs.text:
Academic Year: 2024-2025

  • Initial release of the template.
  • Inclusion of the basics: logo, colors, and structure.
